verses.verse: For <S%H3117><s%>, behold, the day <S%H935>cometh<s%>, it <S%H1197>burneth<s%> as a <S%H8574>furnace<s%>; and all the <S%H2086>proud<s%>, and all that <S%H6213>work<s%> <S%H7564>wickedness<s%>, shall be <S%H7179>stubble<s%>; and the <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H935>cometh<s%> shall burn them <S%H3857>up<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, that it shall <S%H5800>leave<s%> them neither <S%H8328>root<s%> nor <S%H6057>branch<s%>.

But unto you that <S%H3373>fear<s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%> shall the <S%H8121>sun<s%> of <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H2224>arise<s%> with <S%H4832>healing<s%> in its <S%H3671>wings<s%>; and ye shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%>, and <S%H6335>gambol<s%> as <S%H5695>calves<s%> of the <S%H4770>stall<s%>.

And ye shall tread <S%H6072>down<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>; for they shall be <S%H665>ashes<s%> under the <S%H3709>soles<s%> of your <S%H7272>feet<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I <S%H6213>make<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.

Remember <S%H2142><s%> ye the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%>, which I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> unto him in <S%H2722>Horeb<s%> for all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, even <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>ordinances<s%>.

Behold <S%H7971><s%>, I will send you <S%H452>Elijah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3372>terrible<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H935>come<s%>.

And he shall <S%H7725>turn<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%>, and the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> to their <S%H1>fathers<s%>; lest I <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> with a <S%H2764>curse<s%>.
